sentences.sContent: He has read many of the major works of literature.
sentences.sCn: 他读过许多重要的文学作品。

sentences.sContent: literature on the history of science
...Paperbacks of popular literature are more likely to be replaced by e-books...
...a teacher is handing a classic literature book to a student...
...reading literature should be as easy and common as reading text messages...
...we need to equip us with not only science but also literature by which we can beautify our life and the world...
...literature as the collection of great minds will help us enormously broaden our horizons...
...It should be generally acknowledged that classic literature plays a significant role not only in preserving the essence of great minds but also in enhancing the quality of one’s life...
...the beautiful words and sentences flowing in the pages of excellent literature can greatly ease our tiredness...
...It's very easy to spend four years majoring in English literature and come out no more employable than you were before you went in...
...Promotional literature for colleges and student loans often speaks of debt as an "investment in yourself...
...particularly in literature is often mixed with critical writing...
...writing a paper for my literature class...

phrases.pCn: 文献回顾；文献综述；文献评论
n. 大众文学，通俗文学

remMethod.val: liter(文字) ＋ ature(表状态) → 文学， 文学作品
